backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing volunteer interests, contact messages, donation pledges, and user profiles with authorization checks and admin‑only data queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing updated address‑related frontend changes, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping describing each frontend file’s purpose, routing setup, components, pages, constants, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing OKLCH color tokens and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata, favicon, root mount point, and main script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuration defining layout and routes for all main pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/FormStatusBanner: Alert-based status banner component showing success or error messages for form submissions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer containing branding, navigation links, contact info using OFFICE_ADDRESS, and social media links.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu using a sheet component.
frontend/src/constants/ngoContact.ts: Exports the shared OFFICE_ADDRESS constant used across the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useNgoSubmissions.ts: Defines React Query mutations for submitting volunteer interests, contact messages, and donation pledges via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes, plus global typography and accessibility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays mission, vision, values, and team members of the NGO using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and backend submission, plus contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Provides a donation pledge form with validation and backend submission along with impact examples.
frontend/src/pages/GetInvolvedPage.tsx: Volunteer signup page with a validated form, submission mutation, and a list of volunteer opportunity cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, impact metrics, featured programs, and recent updates using static data.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsImpactPage.ts: Programs and impact overview page rendering multiple program cards with descriptions, metrics, and locations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing NGO site requirements, content rules, known issues, and implemented features.
